storyInfo: Even as the people fear and reject her, Hibiscus has never abandoned her responsibilities as a physician. Now, when disaster strikes, the hated Sarkaz becomes the Afterglow's only hope.

attributes.content: Hibiscus!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Where are you!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: My leg... it hurts...
attributes.name: Injured Boy

attributes.content: It's ok. Stay still, and let me have a look.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's just a bruise. No bleeding or fractures. I'll rub some salve on it and you'll be fine.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But it hurts so much when I try to move...
attributes.name: Injured Boy

attributes.content: I know how it feels. I hurt my leg once when I was little. It really hurt, and I was bleeding and scared. I couldn't stop crying.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But you're not crying. That means you're a strong boy, aren't you?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: (Rubs eyes)
attributes.name: Injured Boy

attributes.content: But it's not gonna get better by itself if you sit here like this.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Would you rather sit in the cold and the rain, or go home and get better on your warm and comfy bed?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Come, take my hand, and stand up. Good. Can you go home by yourself?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Injured Boy

attributes.content: Good boy. Now go on home; your mum and dad are waiting.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Injured Boy

attributes.content: Hibiscus!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: What happened at the concert, Hibiscus? Why are you here by yourself?
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Andante... perfect timing.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: No time to explain. I just patched up a few injuries here.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But Originium levels are very high around here. Take them to the office for a closer look...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What the heck are you talking about?!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: What's with all those wounds on you? You're in no shape to help anybody!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Wounds? What are you—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Young lady, why do you—
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: I'll hold down the fort here, Ebenholz. Now!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It can't be. I thought I blocked it...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't worry, I learned a few things from Lava. I know some Ar—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: A few days ago...
Hello, this is the medical assistance center. Is this the number of Mr. Darron?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's you... where's Andante?
attributes.name: Sickly Man

attributes.content: Dr. Andante is out visiting patients, so I'm checking on you on her behalf. Don't worry, I received the same professional training.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: May I come in to do a few checks? Just some basic tests. No blood will be drawn—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Stay away from my house!
attributes.name: Sickly Man

attributes.content: I won't come near without your permission.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But you do not sound well. You should get yourself checked up—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's none of your business!
attributes.name: Sickly Man

attributes.content: I was feeling perfectly fine until you came to the Afterglow, Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Sickly Man

attributes.content: The prophecies were right! You Sarkaz have brought calamity upon the Afterglow!
attributes.name: Sickly Man

attributes.content: It's a complicated situation, and hard to explain... but you need help, and your health should come first.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Enough! I'm not gonna grovel to a Sarkaz, even on my deathbed.
attributes.name: Sickly Man

attributes.content: Very well, I won't force you, if you don't want to get checked up.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Here's some medicine that may help... please don't consider it help from a Sarkaz. I'm simply delivering medicine to those in need, on behalf of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'll leave the medicine at the door. You can pick it up at your convenience.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Go away... or I'll call the guards.
attributes.name: Sickly Man

attributes.content: Sorry... I'll be going.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I've gone through the Afterglow. Based on the number of Infected who have recovered abnormally, we don't have enough supplies at the office to deal with a crisis.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Why hasn't the medicine we ordered come in? I hope that patient doesn't waste the doses...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus—
...What?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: As though hearing a call from afar, Hibiscus turns around, but finds no one there.
Every door and window is closed, as though the scenes of song and dance from a few days ago were merely an illusion.
But the weathered walls and battered tiles look so familiar upon close inspection.
I asked you to carry ingredients for tomorrow into the warehouse, but I didn't expect you to carry enough to last a week. Aren't you tired?
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Ha, don't underestimate Sarkaz strength!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Alright... still, you must be tired. Here, have two servings of fins & chips, and share it with your sister.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Thanks, but I think mom has dinner ready. I'll just take one serving and share it with Lava.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: See? You shouldn't give a young lady too much fried food.
attributes.name: Fruit Stall Owner

attributes.content: Here, take this bag of fruit. Guaranteed to be sweet and juicy.
attributes.name: Fruit Stall Owner

attributes.content: Thanks!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You're welcome. I'm counting on you to tutor that little brat of mine!
attributes.name: Fruit Stall Owner

attributes.content: Come on, Hibiscus, focus...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm back.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Why have you gone out again? Didn't I say I would take care of the investigation for a few days?
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Things in the Afterglow are complicated. I can't just leave it all to you.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: All I did was deliver some medicine to patients in need. I won't draw any attention.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Did anyone bother you...?
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit says a medic's first duty on a field mission is to her own safety.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: What happened the other day—it was their fault, but you shouldn't have charged ahead like that. It was dangerous.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Sorry. I realized afterwards that I should have taken another path... I was angry and anxious, and being right was all I could think of.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But thinking back now, there was really no point to an argument like that.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Good that you realize your mistake. Next time you put yourself in danger like that, I'm putting it in my report.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I'm sure they meant nothing by it. They're just scared after all that's happened lately.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I remember being invited to dance my first day in the Afterglow.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: They probably just mistook you for a Caprinae...
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I don't think so.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I used to think there wasn't much difference between the horn of a Caprinae and that of a Sarkaz, but I recently learned that the Caprinae are able to tell them apart at a glance.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Let me tell you something funny.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I found a Caprinae girl unconscious by the roadside before I arrived in Vyseheim.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I gave her some medicine and water. When she woke up, she recognized me as a Sarkaz and looked scared.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I panicked and said, 'Don't worry, I'm a Caprinae too!'
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: She didn't believe me and ran away screaming.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It was so funny, now that I think of it. Why would a Sarkaz introduce herself like that?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's not funny at all.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'll get the door.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's you...?
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: You just left my house! Don't you remember?
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: I'm his son! You sucked my father's blood!
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: I'm looking for Dr. Andante. Where is she?
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: (Gestures 'pretend I'm not here')
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: She's not here right now. I can help, if you need something.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Er, I...
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: P-Please help my father!
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: He was feeling well a few days ago, but things took a bad turn this morning.
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: He's running a high fever, and new crystals are appearing on his skin...
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: Please, help him!
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: Take me to him.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Y-You'll do it? Than—
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: No time to talk, let's go.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: (Anguished moaning)
attributes.name: Sickly Old Man

attributes.content: Doktor, will my father—
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: I performed some basic treatment to stabilize his condition. He's out of danger for now. Let him sleep.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Will he get better?
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: I can't give you any false hope.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But why...?
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: As is the case with many others in the Afterglow, your father's condition is a type of 'false recovery.'
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The body draws on undamaged organs to fill in for functions that have been damaged, but this is only a stop-gap measure.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Your father is now undergoing the rebound that follows a false recovery. His age only compounds the rapid onset of Oripathy symptoms.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I remember you saying something to the effect.
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: It's all my fault. If only I had...
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: There's no point regretting the past. The important thing is to take care of your father now.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Pay careful attention to his diet, his sleep cycle, and keep his bodily functions in balance. Care is more important than treatment right now.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Alright, I'll do it.
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: And Dr. Hibiscus... I, I'm sorry about—
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: Are you there, Hibiscus?
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Something's not right. We need to—
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Don't disturb the patient. We'll talk outside.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: A dozen patients came into the office right after you left. Some had suddenly lost consciousness, while others experienced a rapid deterioration in vitals.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Other patients are also coming in with various symptoms, but we haven't been able to determine if they are Oripathy-related.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Mr. Schneider's father was not an isolated case. Many patients who had recovered abnormally are entering the rebound stage.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Rhodes Island alone can't take in everyone. Have you asked if the other hospitals can accept patients, or deliver the medicine that we ordered?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I have, but they keep finding excuses. And they said...
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: They needed to ensure sufficient medical supplies for the Cliffy Patio.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: How could they be so irresponsible!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hang in there, Andante. I'm coming back—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Calm down, Hibiscus.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: People are restless right now, and there are many who believe the rumors. This is not the time to show your face.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: But I can't—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: ...You're right.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Could you take care of things at the office, Andante?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Of course. I haven't spent all this time in the Afterglow for nothing.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I'll help!
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: But your father...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The neighbors can care for him for a while. You're short-handed, aren't you?
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: I can help. Anything you need.
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: Alright, this is the list of patients who recovered abnormally.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You know the Afterglow. Check the list and bring the patients who have deteriorated quickly to the office for intensive care.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: I'll take care of the hospitals.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'll convince them.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Doktor! Help me!
attributes.name: Panicking Infected

attributes.content: I wanna go home...
attributes.name: Crying Child

attributes.content: The room is packed with several times the normal number of patients.
There is a sickly smell in the air, which is filled with the sounds of crying and moaning.
Ugh, what's this smell... I have the patients, Dr. Andante.
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: There are too many of them. It's far more than the number of abnormal recoveries we recorded.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: We have our hands full with the cross-infection risk alone.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: You're right. Panic may be even more dangerous than the disease.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The patients don't know their own situations. Whether they're experiencing the rebound or not, Oripathy sufferers believe that their condition is being caused by some unknown threat.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The first priority is to identify the cause of the symptoms, and deal with it individually.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Patients in the rebound stage experience a rapid decline in bodily functions. In the absence of blood tests, body temperature is the most direct sympt—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus! Are you alright over there?
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I... I'm fine.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Take care of the office, Andante.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'll get the medicine.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Alright, be careful!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Is this the troublemaker?
attributes.name: Patrol Officer

attributes.content: This is private property, Fräulein. Even members of other medical institutions require permission to enter.
attributes.name: Private Hospital Doctor

attributes.content: This is your last warning. Leave now.
attributes.name: Private Hospital Doctor

attributes.content: I didn't come to interrupt the work of a fellow medical professional.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But how could you talk about not having enough supplies or beds, when a single flu patient could take up enough space for ten people?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: We make our decisions based on each patient's unique circumstances...
attributes.name: Private Hospital Doctor

attributes.content: S-She's the prophesied devil, isn't she?
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Help! Somebody! Get this Sarkaz out of my room!
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: If I really were the prophesied devil, do you think there's anyone here who could help you?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Eeek—
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: No sudden moves!
attributes.name: Patrol Officer

attributes.content: A dozen wands are aimed at Hibiscus.
Please don't threaten our patients.
attributes.name: Private Hospital Doctor

attributes.content: I'm not threatening anyone. I'm just reminding you, as a fellow doctor, of your moral obligations.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The people of the Afterglow are in serious trouble. I only ask that you provide the necessary medicine to the Rhodes Island branch office and take in a number of patients, in accordance with our agreement.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Am I asking too much?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Why would I listen to a suspicious foreigner? Everyone knows about the prophecy.
attributes.name: Private Hospital Doctor

attributes.content: I'm not wasting my time with her. Remove her from the premises, officer.
attributes.name: Private Hospital Doctor

attributes.content: Fine, call me a devil, then.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Do you remember what the prophecy that you put so much stock in says?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: 'The Blood hides Plague within, slow beckons Death to creep all Ways.' Where do you think things stand with the Afterglow right now?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The prophesied devil stands before you. Take me in, or chase me out. Do whatever you think will protect you.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: And we'll see how high and mighty the Cliffy Patio fares, when calamity strikes.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Mr. Karl—temperatures normal, small increase in blood Originium levels.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Mrs. Marta—temperatures normal, blood Originium levels normal.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Too many files... too much equipment... I, I can't carry any more...
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: No more health food... I need meat...
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Looks like she didn't have the time to eat today. She's dreaming about food.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hey, Andante, you're drooling.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Dr. Hibiscus... you're still up?
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: Just filing some patient data. It's not easy for me to go out during the day, so I have to make it up at night.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Thanks for helping out today. You should go home.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I... I'll stay here. Here's some water for you.
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus reaches out to take the bottle, but it slips from her hand and rolls across the floor.
Sorry... I'll get it.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: I'm fine. Just careless.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Ambulances came this afternoon, not long after you left. How did you persuade them?
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: Not exactly with logic and reason, I guess.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Anyway, it's good that things have calmed down. The temporary quarantine zone should be lifted tomorrow.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Dr. Hibiscus... I have a question.
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: You're new here in the Afterglow. It's not like you had time to make friends, and some folk have even treated you terribly. Why are you still willing to...
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: I think this is the first time I've been treated like a doctor.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: I mostly do the work of a nurse back at HQ, caring for patients and assisting doctors. This is the first time I've been put in charge of things.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You call me doctor, so I had better do my job.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You... you'll forgive what I said to you?
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: What if I say no?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm sorry! I'm really sorry!
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: You can hit me with that flute if you want!
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: I'm just joking. No need to slap yourself.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm not going to pretend that it didn't bother me at all, but it's understandable.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: In the face of terrible danger and an unknown threat, it's natural for people to become wary of outsiders.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Do you really think so?
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: And if I just packed up and left, I would really become the prophesied devil who brought disaster to the Afterglow and then disappeared, wouldn't I?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hate leads only to hate, never to understanding.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I just hope I can fix people's prejudices with my actions, even just a little bit...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Sorry, I wandered off there.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You should get some rest. I'll be over there, and you can call me if you need anything.
attributes.name: Schneider

attributes.content: Whew... things are finally settling down.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I should have a sip of water and take a break—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Cough... cough...
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Water... I'm thirsty... water...
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Oh, here's some water for you!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Cough... cough... whew...
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Feeling better?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: A-Are you a Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Er... maybe you could treat me as a Caprinae?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Pah, I can tell the horns of a Sarkaz from those of a Caprinae at a sight.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Ah, so it's true.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Seeing a Sarkaz under a full moon... am I going to die?
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: I've never heard that legend before.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Ouch, my head hurts. Guess I'm starting to ramble.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Thank you for the care... let's sing a song, whether you're Sarkaz or Caprinae.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: A song? You should rest up. Your condition has just stabilized.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's too quiet... we need some music tonight, even if I die tomorrow.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: I'll sing. Accompany me with your flute.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Very well, if it makes you feel better...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But I'm not great at the flute.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's easy. Just follow my melody.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: I'll start. One, two—
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: The Sky is blue and fine, the Breeze lilts by in Song♪
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: The River murmurs clear, my Heart is filled with Hope♪...
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: The alley is quiet, cleared to accommodate the overflow of patients.
The intermittent sounds of flute and singing echo under the moon, a lullaby for a city just emerging from chaos.
